CUST001.preferences: Loves high-end traditional wear. Prefers rich silk fabrics (Banarasi, Kanjivaram) in deep jewel tones like royal blue and magenta. Shops primarily for wedding occasions.

CUST002.preferences: Prefers casual and comfortable daily wear. Tends to buy simple, breathable cotton kurtas and palazzo sets in pastel colors (mint, lavender).

CUST003.preferences: Modern fusion styles and Indo-Western outfits. Interested in sleek silhouettes, contemporary prints, and georgette/rayon fabrics.

CUST004.preferences: Buys ethnic wear for office and formal events. Focuses on minimal embroidery, professional colors (navy, beige), and tailored Anarkali suits.

CUST005.preferences: Wedding guest attire. Likes heavy sequin work and detailed Zari embroidery on Lehengas and Sarees. Favors gold and crimson colors.

CUST006.preferences: Men's festive wear. Prefers designer Sherwanis and Kurta sets in velvet or raw silk with intricate button and collar work. Likes black and deep maroon.

CUST007.preferences: Interested in organic, handloom fabrics like Khadi and Linen. Looks for earthy tones and traditional block prints.

CUST008.preferences: Party wear dresses and gowns. Prefers flowing fabrics like chiffon and organza. Interested in modern draped sarees and pre-stitched outfits.

CUST009.preferences: Value-conscious shopper. Focuses on multi-pack casual Kurtis and durable synthetic blends. Tends to buy items on sale.

CUST010.preferences: Bridal wear shopping (Lehengas and accessories). High budget. Seeks unique designs and custom-fitted outfits.

CUST011.preferences: Buys traditional clothing for children/kids. Looks for bright colors and comfortable, easy-to-wear fabrics (e.g., silk blends for Kurta Pajamas or Lehengas).

CUST012.preferences: Men's semi-formal wear. Prefers Nehru jackets and fitted Jodhpuri suits in subtle textures and grey/brown palettes.

CUST013.preferences: Loves regional Indian weaves, specifically Pochampally, Paithani, and Bandhani sarees. Prefers vibrant, traditional patterns.

CUST014.preferences: Prefers lightweight, travel-friendly ethnic wear. Buys linen sarees and cotton-silk blend suits. Tends to favor turquoise and coral.

CUST015.preferences: Traditional outfits for religious ceremonies (Pooja, festivals). Seeks sober designs, yellow, white, and red colors, and natural fabrics.

CUST016.preferences: Youth-focused modern ethnic wear. Likes crop-top Lehenga sets, Shrug-style suits, and mirror work embroidery.

CUST017.preferences: Men's casual Kurta Pajamas. Buys comfortable, loose-fitting cotton sets in white or pastel shades for home and casual outings.

CUST018.preferences: Loves heavy Pakistani-style Salwar Suits and Sharara sets. Prefers net and heavy velvet fabrics with elaborate thread work.

CUST019.preferences: Sustainable and ethical fashion focus. Searches for natural dyes, minimal wastage designs, and brands supporting artisans.

CUST020.preferences: Loves vintage/classic saree styles. Seeks traditional Banarasi silk, heavy Zari work, and dark, muted colors like forest green and aubergine.
